Title: Alien
Description: Based on a story by O''Bannon and Ronald Shusett, it follows the crew of the commercial space tug Nostromo, who, after coming across a mysterious derelict spaceship on an undiscovered moon, find themselves up against an aggressive and deadly extraterrestrial set loose on the Nostromo.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction is a genre of speculative fiction which typically deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts.

Director.Name: Ridley Scott
Director.Bio: Ridley Scott is a British film director and producer whose movies are acclaimed for their visual style and rich details.

Title: American Gangster
Descrtiption: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama Films are serious presentations or stories with settings or life situations that portray realistic characters in conflict with either themselves, others, or forces of nature.

Director.Name: Ridley Scott
Director.Bio: Ridley Scott is a British film director and producer whose movies are acclaimed for their visual style and rich details.

Title: Gladiator
Description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: Star Wars Ep. IV A New Hope
Description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire''s world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Genre.Name: Sci-fi
Genre.Description: Science fiction is a genre of speculative fiction which typically deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts.

Director.Name: George Lucas
Director.Bio: George Walton Lucas Jr. is an American film director, producer, screenwriter, and entrepreneur. Lucas is best known for creating the Star Wars and Indiana Jones.

Title: Star Wars Ep. V The Empire Strikes Back
Description: It is the second part of the Star Wars original trilogy. The film concerns the continuing struggles of the Rebel Alliance against the Galactic Empire.

Title: Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Spy
Description: In 1970s England the head of MI6, Control, dispatches an agent to meet with a Hungarian general who knows the identity of a Soviet spy in the organization''s ranks. However, the mission goes wrong, and the general dies before he can reveal the information

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama Films are serious presentations or stories with settings or life situations that portray realistic characters in conflict with either themselves, others, or forces of nature.

Director.Name: Tomas Alfredson
Director.Bio: Hans Christian Tomas Alfredson is a Swedish film director who is best known internationally for directing the 2008 vampire film Let the Right One In and 2011 espionage film Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy.

Title: Titanic
Description: The movie is about the 1912 sinking of the RMS Titanic. It stars Kate Winslet and Leonardo DiCaprio. The two play characters who are of different social classes. They fall in love after meeting aboard the ship, but it was not good for a rich girl to fall in love with a poor boy in 1912.

Genre.Name: Drama

Director.Name: James Cameron
Director.Bio: James Francis Cameron is a Canadian-American filmmaker. Best known for making science fiction and epic films

Title: Avatar
Description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

Genre.Name: Fantasy
Genre.Description: Fantasy films are films that belong to the fantasy genre with fantastic themes, usually magic, supernatural events, mythology, folklore, or exotic fantasy worlds.

Director.Name: James Cameron
Director.Bio: James Francis Cameron is a Canadian-American filmmaker. Best known for making science fiction and epic films

Title: The Abyss
Description: An estranged couple and a paranoid SEAL are called in to investigate when an abandoned submarine is found. They find eerie life-forms floating about the sub along with a nuclear weapon, the combination of which begins to take its toll, putting everyone at risk.

Title: The Labyrinth
Description: Sixteen-year-old Sarah is given thirteen hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother Toby when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King Jareth.
